content: How can I load all the public items in a crate when compiling a library? Currently rustc just reads lib.rs which only contains a bunch of module / use statements, I'd like it to recursively load the whole crate...
I tried writing a simple ItemLikeVisitor but I'm not sure how to get it to work recursively
omg nvm, I had feature gated the whole crate
:face_palm:
Xavier Denis has marked this topic as resolved.
